DOC.brief_summary: The study aims at studying the outcomes of a protocol-based handling of newly diagnosed Inflammatory bowel disease ( IBD ) patients within a defined uptake area in Norway. It is a descriptive study and no hypothesis is predefined. Cytokine studies, QoL and fatigue assessment will be included for hypothesis-generating purposes.
DOC.brief_title: Stavanger University Hospital Inflammatory Bowel Disease Trial
DOC.criteria: newly diagnosed IBD previous IBD with specific treatment within 10 year inability to consent inability to adhere to treatment protocol
